theAya:SpeedUp.NAME: 加速
theAya:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: 从 *流云疾行 和 *腾空之翼 中选择1张 NL 加入你的手牌.
theAya:SpeedUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 从 *流云疾行+ 和 *腾空之翼+ 中选择1张 NL 加入你的手牌.

theAya:WingsOfAscend.NAME: 腾空之翼
theAya:WingsOfAscend.DESCRIPTION: 获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外获得2点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .
theAya:WingsOfAscend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外获得2点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:CloudstreamSprint.NAME: 流云疾行
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.DESCRIPTION: 抽1张牌. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外抽一张牌 NL 消耗 .
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽1张牌. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外抽一张牌 NL 消耗 .

theAya:SpinStrike.NAME: 旋转打击
theAya:SpinStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 这场战斗中每次被抽到,提升 !M! 点伤害.

theAya:MapleDance.NAME: 丹枫之扇舞
theAya:MapleDance.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !theAya:CardWindSpeed! 点 theaya:风速 . 这场战斗中 NL 每次被抽到, NL 提升 !M! 点风速.

theAya:SwiftWindFan.NAME: 疾风扇
theAya:SwiftWindFan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 再攻击一次.

theAya:TenguSpirit.NAME: 天狗之魂
theAya:TenguSpirit.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 获得 [E] 和50点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:GaleAssault.NAME: 狂风突袭
theAya:GaleAssault.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! , theaya:持续技 : NL 获得1点 力量 ,在回合结束时失去它.

theAya:Landing.NAME: 着陆
theAya:Landing.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 无实体 . NL 消耗 . NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:WindborneGlide.NAME: 疾风翱翔
theAya:WindborneGlide.DESCRIPTION: 保留 . NL 获得1点 theaya:飞行 NL 和15点 theaya:风速 . NL 每当被保留,耗能减1.
theAya:WindborneGlide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 , 固有 . NL 获得1点 theaya:飞行 NL 和15点 theaya:风速 . NL 每当被保留,耗能减1.

theAya:Instamatic.NAME: 袖珍相机
theAya:Instamatic.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌, NL 获得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 . NL 虚无 .
theAya:Instamatic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择一张牌并生成1张它的快照
大新闻!
获得快照.
消耗 .
虚无 .

theAya:SpreadRumors.NAME: 传谣
theAya:SpreadRumors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !M! 点虚弱. NL 造成 !M! 点易伤.

theAya:TempestWrath.NAME: 暴风之怒
theAya:TempestWrath.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 如果处于 theaya:进攻之风 , NL 获得1点 力量 .

theAya:GentleBreeze.NAME: 清风
theAya:GentleBreeze.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 如果处于 theaya:治愈之风 , NL 获得5点临时血量.

theAya:NocturnalTempest.NAME: 暗夜狂风
theAya:NocturnalTempest.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 造成1层 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外造成1层 theaya:颤抖 .

theAya:Windsweeper.NAME: 驱风
theAya:Windsweeper.DESCRIPTION: theaya:风力 !M! , theaya:持续技 : NL 抽1张牌.

theAya:Leap.NAME: 飞跃
theAya:Leap.DESCRIPTION: 消耗1张牌, NL 获得 !M! 点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:WindBlade.NAME: 风刃
theAya:WindBlade.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外造成 !D! 点伤害.

theAya:Accelerator.NAME: 极速装置
theAya:Accelerator.DESCRIPTION: 翻倍当前的 theaya:风速 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:TheClutchClaw.NAME: 飞翔爪
theAya:TheClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:AirplaneMode.NAME: 飞行模式
theAya:AirplaneMode.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 获得4点 theaya:飞行 .

theAya:Dive.NAME: 俯冲
theAya:Dive.DESCRIPTION: 每有1点 theaya:飞行 , NL 造成 !D! 点伤害1次. NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:WindSurge.NAME: 风涌
theAya:WindSurge.DESCRIPTION: theaya:风力 !M! : 下回合获得 [E] [E] . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:CrowShadow.NAME: 乌鸦的暗影
theAya:CrowShadow.DESCRIPTION: 获得20点 theaya:风速 和3点 theaya:飞行 .

theAya:ScytheWindVeil.NAME: 镰风面纱
theAya:ScytheWindVeil.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点格挡 NL 和 !B! 点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:Flow.NAME: 流动
theAya:Flow.DESCRIPTION: 抽取 !M! 张手牌, NL 丢弃 !M! 张手牌. NL theaya:风力 10: 结束后再抽1张牌.

theAya:Advertisement.NAME: 广告
theAya:Advertisement.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌获得 theaya:快照 ,其费用加2, NL 执行X次. NL theaya:风力 100:快照不额外添加费用.
theAya:Advertisement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌获得 theaya:快照 ,其费用加2, NL 执行X+1次. NL theaya:风力 100:快照不额外添加费用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张牌并生成1张它的快照
大新闻!
获得快照.
消耗 .
虚无 .

theAya:Industrialization.NAME: 工业化
theAya:Industrialization.DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 费用减X.
theAya:Industrialization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 费用减X+1.

theAya:TenguDailyReport.NAME: 天狗报当日截稿
theAya:TenguDailyReport.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌, NL 获得两张它的 theaya:快照 , NL 其费用加1. NL theaya:风力 !M! :快照不添加额外费用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张牌并生成1张它的快照
大新闻!
获得快照.
消耗 .
虚无 .

theAya:CatapultLaunch.NAME: 弹射起步
theAya:CatapultLaunch.DESCRIPTION: 如果没有 theaya:飞行 ,获得5点飞行和30点 theaya:风速 ,否则获得1点飞行.

theAya:TemporaryTruce.NAME: 暂时休战
theAya:TemporaryTruce.DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:风速 , NL 本回合不再获得风速, NL 下回合返还2倍失去的风速.
theAya:TemporaryTruce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:风速 , NL 本回合不再获得风速, NL 下回合返还3倍失去的风速.

theAya:FieryCombo.NAME: 火热连击
theAya:FieryCombo.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果处于 theaya:进攻之风 ,每打出1张牌获得1点 力量 . NL theaya:风力 20:先进入进攻之风.

theAya:WindShield.NAME: 风之守护
theAya:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: 本回合 NL 如果处于 theaya:抵御之风 , NL 获得20点防御. NL theaya:风力 10:保留防御到下回合.

theAya:Heal.NAME: 愈合
theAya:Heal.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果处于 theaya:治愈之风 ,将临时血量转变为血量. NL theaya:风力 10:先进入治愈之风.

theAya:WindGodGirl.NAME: 风神少女
theAya:WindGodGirl.DESCRIPTION: 如果处于 theaya:翱翔之风 ,将 theaya:风速 翻 !M! 倍. NL theaya:风力 20:先进入翱翔之风.

theAya:TurbulentLand.NAME: 动荡之地
theAya:TurbulentLand.DESCRIPTION: 进入随机风种, NL theaya:风力 10: 获得20点 theaya:风速 .
theAya:TurbulentLand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入随机风种, NL 获得20点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:OffensiveStance.NAME: 进攻姿态
theAya:OffensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:进攻之风 , NL 获得3点临时力量.
theAya:OffensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:进攻之风 , NL 获得3点临时力量, NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:ShiftingTengu.NAME: 变换的鸦天狗
theAya:ShiftingTengu.DESCRIPTION: 每次切换风种,获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:DefensiveStance.NAME: 防御姿态
theAya:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:抵御之风 , NL 获得10点格挡.
theAya:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:抵御之风 , NL 获得10点格挡, NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:Convection.NAME: 对流
theAya:Convection.DESCRIPTION: 每获得30点 theaya:风速 ,对所有敌人造成3点伤害

theAya:WindCut.NAME: 风切
theAya:WindCut.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 15:再攻击1次. NL theaya:风力 30:再攻击2次.

theAya:TenguCombo.NAME: 鸦天狗之连击
theAya:TenguCombo.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !M! 点伤害,获得5点 theaya:风速 ,你每次切换风种时,将这张牌从弃牌堆放回你的手牌.

theAya:WindlessWeather.NAME: 无风天气
theAya:WindlessWeather.DESCRIPTION: 失去所有 theaya:风速 和 theaya:飞行 ,获得 !M! 点 无实体 , 消耗 . NL theaya:风力 100: 不消耗.

theAya:Printer.NAME: 打印机
theAya:Printer.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 选择1张手牌获得它的 theaya:快照 ,其费用加1.

theAya:WindTurbine.NAME: 风能发电机
theAya:WindTurbine.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 减少20 theaya:风速 ,获得 [E] .

theAya:CommonCold.NAME: 感冒
theAya:CommonCold.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 NL 和3层 中毒 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 多施加2层中毒 NL theaya:风力 !M! : NL 多施加1层 theaya:颤抖 .

theAya:StartlingTeleport.NAME: 文文的瞬间移动
theAya:StartlingTeleport.DESCRIPTION: 造成2层 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:风力 10:额外造成1层颤抖. NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 , 消耗 .
theAya:StartlingTeleport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成3层 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 , 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:SwiftRunning.NAME: 疾走风靡
theAya:SwiftRunning.DESCRIPTION: 获得50点 theaya:风速 . NL theaya:风力 100: 给所有敌人2层 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:SwiftRunning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得70点 theaya:风速 , NL theaya:风力 100: 给所有敌人2层 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.NAME: 高速摄影
theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.DESCRIPTION: 随机生成1张手牌的 theaya:快照 .

theAya:FullSpeedImpact.NAME: 全速冲击
theAya:FullSpeedImpact.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! , theaya:持续技 : NL 再攻击一次 NL 且伤害乘1.05倍.

theAya:HealingStance.NAME: 愈合姿态
theAya:HealingStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:治愈之风 , NL 获得5点临时血量.
theAya:HealingStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:治愈之风 , NL 获得5点临时血量, NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:SoaringStance.NAME: 翱翔姿态
theAya:SoaringStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:翱翔之风 , NL 获得2点 theaya:飞行 .
theAya:SoaringStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:翱翔之风 , NL 获得2点 theaya:飞行 , NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:LockOnTarget.NAME: 锁定目标
theAya:LockOnTarget.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 随机给1个敌人添加 NL 1层 theaya:天狗标 和1层 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:DexterousTengu.NAME: 鸦天狗的技艺
theAya:DexterousTengu.DESCRIPTION: 抽2张牌. NL theaya:风力 10: 再抽1张.

theAya:BouncingAya.NAME: 文文弹跳
theAya:BouncingAya.DESCRIPTION: 每一次风速归零, NL 获得15点 theaya:风速 NL 和1点 theaya:飞行 , NL 每回合最多10次.

theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.NAME: 飞翔爪软化
theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 NL 和 !M! 层 易伤 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.NAME: 枫叶飞舞
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害并获得 NL !M! 点 theaya:风速 X次.
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害并获得 NL !M! 点 theaya:风速 X+1次.

theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.NAME: 八咫乌旋风
theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害, NL 如果杀死敌人, NL 本局游戏中伤害加5. NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:FanningAssault.NAME: 急促扇击
theAya:FanningAssault.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 当前每有50 theaya:风速 , NL 伤害加1倍. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 再攻击1次.

theAya:BlackFeathers.NAME: 黑羽
theAya:BlackFeathers.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害 并施加1层 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:FeatherStrike.NAME: 羽击
theAya:FeatherStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害并施加 !M! 层 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:BewitchingFan.NAME: 飘妖扇
theAya:BewitchingFan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害并施加 !M! 层 theaya:天狗标 .

theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.NAME: 鸟居旋风
theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害3次. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 施加1层 theaya:黑羽 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.NAME: 暴力取材
theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.DESCRIPTION: 造成6点伤害, NL theaya:风力 !M! : NL 若手牌中有攻击卡, NL 随机选中1张, NL 打出其 theaya:快照 .

theAya:TenguAmulet.NAME: 天狗护符
theAya:TenguAmulet.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 . NL 被抽到后获得 NL 20点 theaya:风速 和2点 theaya:飞行 .
theAya:TenguAmulet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 . NL 被抽到后获得 NL 30点 theaya:风速 和3点 theaya:飞行 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这张牌不能被打出 .

theAya:TenguGaleBullet.NAME: 天狗烈风弹
theAya:TenguGaleBullet.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 若处于 theaya:进攻之风 , NL 伤害乘3. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 先进入进攻之风.

theAya:DanceOfWings.NAME: 羽翼之舞
theAya:DanceOfWings.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 每有1点 theaya:飞行 , NL 伤害加 !M! . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:MapleGale.NAME: 枫华疾风
theAya:MapleGale.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 3 次, NL 每次施加1层 theaya:天狗标 .

theAya:FanDanceStorm.NAME: 扇舞风云
theAya:FanDanceStorm.DESCRIPTION: 造成6点伤害, NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 NL 和1点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:FanDanceStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成9点伤害, NL 获得15点 theaya:风速 NL 和2点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:NewsBlitz.NAME: 新闻突击
theAya:NewsBlitz.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 随机获得1张手牌的 theaya:快照 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:NewsBlitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 随机获得1张手牌的 theaya:快照 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:CeaselessShutter.NAME: 永不停息的快门
theAya:CeaselessShutter.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! , theaya:持续技 : NL 若手牌中有攻击卡, NL 随机选中1张, NL 打出其 theaya:快照 .

theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.NAME: 报社产业升级
theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: 产生的 theaya:快照 费用减1.

theAya:UnknownMaru.NAME: ？？丸
theAya:UnknownMaru.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 给予随机1名敌人 theaya:颤抖 .

theAya:Updraft.NAME: 上升气流
theAya:Updraft.DESCRIPTION: 每回合结束, NL 当前 theaya:风速 每有30, NL 获得1点 theaya:飞行 .

theAya:FastestInGensokyo.NAME: 幻想乡最速
theAya:FastestInGensokyo.DESCRIPTION: 每回合结束, NL 当前 theaya:飞行 每有1, NL 获得10点 theaya:风速 .
